name: Dual Fright
description:
The year is 2007, and Nintendo is currently developing the latest console in the DS family of systems, the Nintendo DSi

You're tasked with testing a handful of small games from upcoming titles to test the console's capabilities, but things quickly take a weird turn as you start hearing faint footsteps from outside

Programming & visuals by Electro
Music by SpaghettDoggo
Nintendo DS model by zombitt
Five Nights at Freddy's by Scott Cawthon
